actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide an inflation adjustment for the amount exempted from gift tax.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase the gift tax annual exclusion to $6,100 (with a cost of living adjustment for the quarter in which the gift is made) beginning in 1978.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide an inflation adjustment for the amount exempted from gift tax.
